name: Hyper Warp
description:
When you're trapped in space, there's only one thing to do: HYPER WARP. 

Launch your ship at the hyper crystals to collect them all on each level. But beware! Your ship can only launch once every three seconds and between launches its movement is out of your control. Can you collect the hyper crystals before the warp gate closes?!

Hyper Warp is an Action / Arcade game created in 48 hours for the GMTK game gam 2020. With an aesthetic inspired by classic arcade games like Asteroids and Lunar Lander and fast paced modern gameplay and controls, Hyper Warp is certain to bring you MINUTES of fun!
